issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

fields.description:
*Assessment*

After setting up a federated cloud, attempted to run BundleInstance by a non-eucalyptus account user from a remote client.  {{euca-bundle-instance}} returned the following:
{code}
[root@c-31 ~]# euca-bundle-instance -b ubuntu-xenial-x86-64-hvm-nginx -p ubuntu-xenial-nginx i-000ab2f4 --region qa-admin@asap-rocky
euca-bundle-instance: error (InternalError): Unable to create bucket ubuntu-xenial-x86-64-hvm-nginx
{code}
After further inspection on the 'asap-rocky' region, this was found in the cloud-debug logs:
{code}
